data.actual_result: It doesnt close QS after redirecting to the channel the in-app notification was from
data.expected_result: It should take you to the channel and close QS
data.short_description: Opening an in-app notification while Quick Switcher is open doesn't close Quick Switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick Switcher via double-tap on the back button, (otherwise you can't get in-app notifs). Make sure you've set "Back button opens channel drawer" for that. - Get an in-app notification - Open it
